DataElement.preferredName: Person Biological Entity Race Code OMOP CDM Race Concept Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single human being.:Pertaining to biology or to life and living things.:An independently existing thing (living or nonliving)._An arbitrary classification of taxonomic group that is a division of a species; usually arise as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and characterised by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in case of humans, by com:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data._A foreign key that refers to an identifier in the CONCEPT table for the unique race of the person.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A single human being.:Pertaining to biology or to life and living things.:An independently existing thing (living or nonliving)._An arbitrary classification of taxonomic group that is a division of a species; usually arise as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and characterised by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in case of humans, by com:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A single human being.:Pertaining to biology or to life and living things.:An independently existing thing (living or nonliving).

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to biology or to life and living things.
An independently existing thing (living or nonliving).

Property.preferredDefinition: An arbitrary classification of taxonomic group that is a division of a species; usually arise as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and characterised by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in case of humans, by com:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval.  mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A foreign key that refers to an identifier in the CONCEPT table for the unique race of the person.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of North and South America (including Central America) and who maintains tribal affiliation or community attachment. (OMB)

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of North and South America (including Central America) and who maintains tribal affiliation or community attachment. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. (OMB)

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the Black racial groups of Africa. Terms such as "Haitian" or "Negro" can be used in addition to "Black or African American". (OMB)

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the Black racial groups of Africa. Terms such as "Haitian" or "Negro" can be used in addition to "Black or African American". (OMB)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. (OMB)

Concepts.longName: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa. (OMB)

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: remove embedded concept code from the Long Name - DW 02-10-2016

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
